text: Thazhava is a village in Karunagappally taluk, Kollam district, Kerala, India. ==Transport== Main transport is provided by State owned Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC) and private transport bus operators. Karunagappally railway station is the nearest railway station. Trivandrum International Airport is the nearest airport. ==References== ==Other websites== *census in Thazhava Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Thazhava
